name: Tenga Seiha
overview: Tenga Seiha is a strategy / simulation game released by Imageneer for the Playstation & Saturn consoles in 1997 based on the Mediaval japan shogunate style. The game is divided into different sections, the main one is inside the player's character house where he meets his generals and spies that will provide him advices to improve the army, the land, etc. Other part of the game is a overview of the main town, and other is in the battle parts where the player can select which action will want his army to make.
